description: Unique identifier for this part-comment record; used as the primary key.
Identifier of the inventory item the note pertains to; foreign key to the part master.
System timestamp when the comment record was initially created.
Username or system process that created the comment record.
Flag controlling whether/how the note is copied to related documents (e.g., work orders, purchase orders); likely an option bitmask or code; confirm with SME.
Indicator for whether the note should appear on printed or customer-facing documents; values represent visibility levels; confirm exact code meanings.
Free‑text note about the part (instructions, cross‑references, corrections, vendor numbers, etc.).
Username that last modified the comment content or settings.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated change recorded by the application; may differ from the system update time.
Internal user identifier of the creator, for audit purposes.
Audit timestamp when the creator saved the record in the application; may mirror the system create time.
Internal user identifier of the person who last modified the record, for audit purposes.
Audit timestamp of the most recent modification made through the application.
